sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"general-migration-notes"}}>{`General Migration Notes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Skills now run on node 10 (previously ran on node 8)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"initial-cli-setup"}}>{`Initial CLI setup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Use node 10`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`nvm install 10`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Set node 10 as default`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`nvm alias default 10`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"uninstall-old-sprucebot-cli"}}>{`Uninstall old sprucebot cli`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We've namespaced our packages so let's ensure that the old cli is not installed`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm uninstall -g sprucebot-cli`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`yarn global remove sprucebot-cli`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"install-latest-sprucebot-cli"}}>{`Install latest sprucebot cli`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm i -g @sprucelabs/sprucebot-cli@latest`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"verify-your-cli-version"}}>{`Verify your cli version`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`sprucebot --version`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Ensure that the version you're using is 2.6.0 or greater`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"upgrade-a-skill"}}>{`Upgrade a skill`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`cd /path/to/skill`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`rm -rf node_modules`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`nvm use 10`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`sprucebot skill update`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Choose the "beta" release`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Choose the merge method of "reject" - this will create `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.rej`}</MDXTag>{` files with anything that git was not automatically able to merge`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`The cli will list the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.rej`}</MDXTag>{` files. You should go through each of these and manually compare what has changed to the existing files, updating accordingly.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`In most cases you will not want to update pages or components since you will have already created custom UI elements specific to your skill`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`If you need to list the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.rej`}</MDXTag>{` files again you can run the command: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`find . -type f -name '*.rej'`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Once you're finished you can remove the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.rej`}</MDXTag>{` files using a similar find command: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`find . -type f -name '*.rej' -delete`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"other-notes"}}>{`Other Notes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`After upgrading, check out the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`.env.example`}</MDXTag>{` file to see new environment variables that may need to be added.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"env-variables"}}>{`Env variables`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`IMPORTANT:`}</MDXTag>{` Add new environment variable when running locally: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ENV=local`}</MDXTag>{`. This is checked for in the config and allows the project to be run from the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`src/`}</MDXTag>{` directory (instead of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`build/`}</MDXTag>{` directory). This uses `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`flow-node`}</MDXTag>{` to run the project locally since we've introduced the ability to use `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://flow.org/"}}>{`Flow`}</MDXTag>{` in skills.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Note that flow in skills kit is still an experimental feature and may not be supported long-term. We're also evaluating the use of `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://www.typescriptlang.org/"}}>{`typescript`}</MDXTag>{`. However, it's simple to remove flow annotations from files (this is what `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn build:strip-flow`}</MDXTag>{` does) so migrating to something else in the future is trivial.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
